attributes.action: Promote Cpt. Tom Moore to Major for raising NHS funds for during COVID-19 crisis
attributes.additional_details:
Cpt. Moore set a modest target but captured the UK's heart. 
Captain Tom Moore's 100th Birthday Walk for the NHS is on course to raise over £5m for the NHS during the COVID-19 crisis. 
Given his efforts during this campaign I feel it would be a fitting gesture from the Government to promote his rank to Major in recognition of he achievement. Thank you.
attributes.background:
During the COVID-19 crisis Captain Tom Moore, at the age of 99, took it upon himself to raise funds for the NHS.

https://www.justgiving.com/fundraising/tomswalkforthenhs

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
